basics.name: Tobias Wust
basics.label: React Frontend Developer
basics.summary: I wanted to make videos games since age 11, so I started to learn software development very early. After my Bachelor of Science in Business Information Systems I worked with SAP/ABAP in the Public Sector for 4 Years. Then decided to quit and freelance remotely. Now I do web development, mostly with React, but I'm also experienced with other frameworks.

work.name: Tobias Wust
work.summary: I build beautiful and functional Frontends - usually with React.

work.name: hitcap esports GmbH
work.summary: hitcap was a Startup in the gaming industry with two products. We built a social media platform for gamers and a coaching platform for aspiring professionals. In both projects I worked as frontend developer with React and made real, what the Designers imagined.

work.name: Musikerstube
work.summary: Musikerstube is a music teacher who teaches the styrian harmonica. I helped him to build a custom video player for vimeo where customers can easily repeat sections of a video for easier musical practice.

work.name: Deichstadtvolleys
work.summary: Deichstadtvolleys is a Volleyballteam. I helped them to show their game results on their website using the API of the german volleyball league.

work.name: book-in Manager
work.summary: book-in manager is a react based management tool for hotels and airbnbs wghere I helped with some custom components.

work.name: Divery.io
work.summary: Divery is a ERP specifally for Dive Centers where they can plan courses and bill them to customers. It can also be used for materials management in a shop. When I came to the project it was built with jQuery. As the only developer I continued with jQuery for a while and later when we had more developers we changed to React.

work.name: konzeption sg
work.summary: konzeption sg is a webdesign agency. I help them, when there a difficult development tasks. For example I created a Custom Wordpress plugin for a real estate agency that wanted to use their Wordpress website to manage their properties and export those to several real estate platforms.

work.name: Iklr.de (Herzretterkurse GmbH)
work.summary: Iklr (ich kanne leben retten / I can save lifes) is a initiative to teach people cardiopulmonary resuscitation. I helped redesign and develop a new Website with Wordpress.

work.name: Ello Rollator (eMovements GmbH)
work.summary: Ello Rollator is a startup that builds electric rollator walkers. I helped the exisiting Wordpress Team with individual development issues.

work.name: Flugschule Phoenix
work.summary: Flugschule Phoenix is a paragliding school for which I designed and created a new Website with Wordpress including a course management and booking system.

work.name: REMEDYNE GmbH
work.summary: Remedyne is a Fraud Prevention Add-on for SAP. I developed some Fraud Checks, took care of internationalization and helped develop a serverless API on AWS
